summary.span: 協助讀取組態檔的 區段，並建立包含用戶端瀏覽器能力資訊的 類別執行個體。

span.span: Assists in reading in the section of a configuration file and creating an instance of the class that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和對應``組態區段在.NET Framework 2.0 版中已被取代。The class and the corresponding `` configuration section have been deprecated in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 管理的瀏覽器功能的慣用的方法是透過瀏覽器定義檔案會編譯以供類別。The preferred method for managing browser capabilities is through browser definition files that are compiled for use by the class. 這兩個組態方法的目標是要產生的執行個體類別，可從存取屬性類別。The goal of both configuration methodologies is to generate an instance of the class that can be accessed from the property of the class. 可以使用來儲存瀏覽器功能的瀏覽器定義檔案提供替代方案的優點。Using the browser definition files to store browser capabilities affords advantages over the alternative. 它可提升的效能，因為瀏覽器定義資訊會從 XML 組態檔中剖析並編譯成事先類別。It offers improved performance because the browser definition information is parsed from the XML configuration file and compiled into a class ahead of time. 還有更輕鬆地維護瀏覽器定義檔案：The browser definition files are also easier to maintain: - 定義為階層式，並因此規則運算式來判斷瀏覽器功能較不依賴。The definitions are hierarchical, and thus rely less on regular expressions to determine the browser capabilities. - 定義可以組織在多個檔案，使其更容易管理。The definitions can be organized in multiple files, making them easier to manage. - 可以在任何層級，於 Machine.config 層級或特定應用程式層級定義的定義。The definitions can be defined at any level, either at the Machine.config level or a specific application level. 這樣就不需要複製完整的定義，以覆寫特定瀏覽器的功能。This eliminates the need to copy the entire set of definitions for the purpose of overriding the capabilities for a specific browser.
